title: Hot actress Keerthy Suresh mom Menaka almost kidnapped by Bhavana attacker Pulsar Suni - Tamil Movie News
text: Huge drop for Vijay's 'Bairavaa' The main accused in the Bhavana molestation case, Pulsar Suni, is said to be an employee of actor-producer-director Lal and he has a history of such unacceptable behavior. Producer Suresh, the father of actress Keerthy Suresh has stated that a few years back his wife actress, Menaka was driving her car in Kochi when Suni followed her and tried to kidnap her. Menaka however escaped and the family lodged a complaint against him but Suresh says that no action was taken against him.
